import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function App() { const [todo , setTodo] = useState([]) const [todoId , setTodoId] = useState("") useEffect(() => { getData( ) },[]) const getData = () => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/todo") .then(res => { console.log(res) setTodo(res.data.todo) console.log(todo) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } const archive = () => { axios.put(`http://localhost:8000/todo?_id=${todoId}` , { status: true }) .then((res:any) => { res.json() }) } return (

form

) : ( <>

) } )) }
) } export default App
